forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West southwest wind 10 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks into the early hours of a San Francisco evening, the city is cloaked in a cool, gentle embrace. The night sky, partly draped in clouds, reveals a low temperature of around fifty-two, with a brisk west-southwest wind weaving through the streets at a steady pace, reminding wanderers of the city’s ever-present charm and chill. If you step outside, you’ll feel the faint gusts, playful yet sharp, invigorating your spirit in the quiet moments of twilight.

Wednesday promises a shift towards brightness, beckoning at the dawn with mostly sunny skies, hinting at a high of sixty-one. The winds will persist, whispering along at a brisk speed, encouraging outdoor pursuits. The clarity of day will be a welcome treat, though expect a lingering marine layer near the coast, hinting at the ocean’s presence like a gentle reminder of the bay’s embrace. It would be wise to dress in layers; a light jacket paired with a shirt might be ideal. The world outside invites you to stroll along the waterfront, perhaps catch a glimpse of the majestic Golden Gate, or share a quiet moment at one of the city’s many coffee shops, where the aroma of fresh brews dances in the air. There’s an understated beauty to these conditions; it’s a day ready to be lived quietly yet fully.
